abstract: AAA motor club reports first daily rise national gasoline prices following 123 consecutive days of decline; average price rises to $2.04 per gallon, rate that remains $1.25 lower than it was one year earlier.
lead_paragraph: The slight daily increase is not necessarily a sign of a trend toward higher prices at the pump, energy experts said.
snippet: The slight daily increase is not necessarily a sign of a trend toward higher prices at the pump, energy experts said.

keywords.value: Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries
keywords.name: organizations

headline.main: After Steadily Falling, Price for Gas Notches an Increase
headline.print_headline: After Steadily Falling, Price for Gas Notches an Increase
